title: Paul Mitchell logo
content:
Any ideas what this is? Or similar fonts?

[http://www.paulmitchell.com/Pages/Home.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150411010706/http:/www.paulmitchell.com/Pages/Home.aspx "http://www.paulmitchell.com/Pages/Home.aspx")
author: HiekkaGraphics

comments.content: The shape of the C and M make me think this is a customised Eurostile, with an upside-down U as starting point for the A.
